overview: When Lucas was seen as a girl named Laura, he always wanted to be a boy. Now he is one. This candid documentary follows Lucas Waldron, a 21 year-old man transitioning from female to male, as he negotiates what it means to be transgender after years of struggling to identify himself.  Told through personal interviews, old photos, and footage, SEX: M seeks to explain what the T in LGBT really means.
title: Sex: M
